person.note: Sun(1) Di [7343] Zhang(2) Liang's [7159] son-in-law. He maintained a residence in Suzhou. Same birthday as Zhang(1) Yu(2) [325] as well as tongnianyou. XNYL, 21.3b, 22.1a, 11a; Suzhou FZ, 139.21a-21b. CHECK funerary inscriptions for kin in his wenji before checking off. CBD, 3, 1813-4.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1129: Apt. (Shi) Hubu shangshu1129: In office as Hubu shangshu and at a later date in this month out of this office
